description: Upward Mobility's Java 2 Platform, Enterprise Edition (J2EE) Flashcards for Palm webOS presents 216 need-to-know Java EE 6 terms and concepts for the aspiring Java Enterprise Architect.  The perfect app for the on-the-go Java professional!  ||  All of our app content is created exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process.  ||  Topics include: Application Design Concepts and Principles, Common Architectures, Integration and Messaging, Business Tier Technologies, We Tier Technologies, Patterns, and Security.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
